name: Games Festival 1
overview: Enjoy the carnival spirit with 8 skill games, solo or multiplayer, as fun and addictive as in real life: can-shy, hook-a-duck, basketball, ring-toss, darts, horse racing, skeeball and golf. The features of the 3DS mean you can play right away: launch the darts with the gyro sensor, slide the stylus to knock down all the cans, and much more! Challenge your friends in local multiplayer and play on up to 8 consoles with just one game card! Break your records and compare them with other players using StreetPass. Characteristics : -8 fairground attractions faithfully reproduced -Easy to understand, so you can play right away -Unlimited replayability thanks to score based game.
